description:
Shuusuke has been selected by Ran as the savior and is hard at work practicing to speak and act like a savior as he has been told he will be revealed as such in just two days time.
On the other hand, Ran`s twin sister Rin has become strangely fond of Nao`s lips, and threatens to tell Shuusuke about Nao`s stalking if she doesn`t join her for lunch. Nao eventually asks Iroha for help getting away from Rin... but it might not work out just as planned...

titles.title: Calling Out to Brother from the Center of the World
Sekai no Chuushin de Ani o Sakebu
世界の中心で兄を叫ぶ
